University workBypass infographics
Year2016
LocationArgentina
DeliverablesPrint

Interactive museum concept

About this project

The need was to design an infographic poster that will take shape in three instances, running on a system of fascicles in a collection, resulting in a drivable publishing support.

The assigned topic was extensively and intensively researched, the information was processed and edited graphically, reaching the result displayed here.

Work mode consisted of three stages: survey / draft / project.

Responsibilities
Research
  • Deep involvement to the subject.
Design
  • Information design.
  • Illustrations.
Print
  • Foldable fascicle.
  • Home
  • WTF?
